short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retain and Comprehend Complex English Words with Personalized Learning.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop struggling to understand complex English words and phrases while browsing the Internet. With MnemoPack / Language, you can access AI-powered definitions and insights right at your fingertips.

Features:
✨ AI-Powered Definitions: Get comprehensive explanations, including synonyms, related words, and usage examples.
🔄 Seamless Integration: No more switching back and forth between tabs to look up definitions in a separate translation app.
📋 Easy-to-Use Side Panel: A convenient side panel displays information cards for each word or phrase you want to explore.
💾 Save Your Progress: Cards are saved within the extension, so you can easily revisit previously looked-up words.
🌐 Sync Across Devices: Access your saved cards on the MnemoPack web platform, perfect for recapping words on the go via a mobile device!
